events.event_description: The value of energy trade between the United States and Canada decreased by 20% to $152 billion in 2023 due to falling energy prices, despite flat trade volumes.
events.citation: The value of energy trade between the United States and Canada decreased in 2023 from the record set in 2022 as energy prices fell, according to data from the U.S. Census Bureau. Although the amount of energy traded between the two countries was largely flat in 2023, the value decreased by 20% when adjusted for inflation to $152 billion.

events.event_description: U.S. crude oil imports from Canada increased by 2% to 3.9 million barrels per day in 2023, while the value decreased 18% to $93 billion due to lower oil prices.
events.citation: U.S. crude oil imports from Canada in 2023 averaged 3.9 million barrels per day (b/d), 2% more than in 2022. The value of U.S. imports of crude oil from Canada decreased 18% in 2023 to $93 billion because of the drop in the average price of crude oil.

events.event_description: The Trans Mountain Pipeline expansion started operations, nearly tripling crude oil capacity from Alberta to Burnaby port in British Columbia.
events.citation: However, the recent startup of the Trans Mountain Pipeline expansion nearly tripled the crude oil produced in Alberta to be sent to Burnaby, a port in British Columbia with access to global oil tankers.

events.event_description: Natural gas imports from Canada decreased 3% to 8.0 Bcf/d in 2023, while their value dropped 36% due to multi-year low prices.
events.citation: Natural gas imports from Canada in 2023 averaged 8.0 billion cubic feet per day (Bcf/d), 3% lower than in 2022, while the value of these imports was 36% lower in 2023.

events.event_description: The value of electricity imports from Canada to the United States fell by 19% in 2023, accounting for 74% of total electricity trade between the two countries.
events.citation: The value of imported electricity from Canada into the United States fell by 19% in 2023 but accounted for 74% of the total electricity traded between the two countries.
